text: The Maniac Cook is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Maniac CookRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars Anita Hendrie, Marion Leonard, and Harry Solter. ==Actors== * Anita Hendrie as Margie, the Cook * Marion Leonard as Mrs. Holland * Harry Solter as Mr. Holland * Clara T. Bracy * George Gebhardt as Policeman * David Miles * Mack Sennett as Policeman ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Maniac Cook
